Topic.Title: How do I make a list of objects or attributes that can be chosen from?

Posts.EditableText: I have been trying to figure out how to make a menu or list of attributes that players can choose from that changes the characteristics of the object that gets put into inventory. I tried to use the tutorials but have not had any luck.
